params.owner: Address to deploy the proxy for.

params.account: Address to determine the proxy address for.

returns._0: bytes32 Next seed which will be used for deployment for an address.
address Proxy address owned by account.
returns._1: bool Whether if proxy is deployed

returns._0: bool Whether if a contract is an OpsProxy.

params.implementation: New OpsProxy implementation to be updated to.

_nextSeeds.details: track the next seed to be used by an EOA.

implementation.details: Must return an address that can be used as a delegate call target. {BeaconProxy} will check that this address is a contract.

BeaconUpdated(address,address).notice: Emitted when OpsProxy implementation is updated

DeployProxy(address,address,bytes32,byte.notice: Emitted when an OpsProxy is deployed.

determineProxyAddress(address).notice: Determines the OpsProxy address when it is not deployed.
